    • Constructor Detail

      • Ball

        public Ball(int x,
            int y,
            int width,
            int height,
            int color)
        Creates a new ball with 3 lives and a 0 score
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate
        y - y coordinate
        width - width of ball
        height - height of ball
        color - integer that represents the color of the ball
        Precondition:
        color is between 0-3 inclusive, no negative x and y coordinates, no negative widths and heights
        Postcondition:
        new ball is created
